message.name: ERR_FV_UPPER_ADDRESSELEMENT_EXCEEDED_LIMIT
message.locale: The limit on %1c has been exceeded by %2n character(s).

message.name: INF_ADDRESS_TICKET_SUBJECT
message.locale: A non-standard address was created or modified.

message.name: INF_ADDRESS_TICKET_REASON
message.locale: User %1s has created or modified a non-standard address (ID %2n).

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_LAYOUT_TYPE
message.locale: Address layout type is unrecognized or unspecified.
Address layout type is unrecognised or unspecified.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_NOT_MODIFIABLE
message.locale: The address record with ID %1n is marked as non-modifiable and therefore cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_RNFE_TO_CLONE
message.locale: The address record to be cloned (with ID %1n) is not found in the database.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_LAYOUT_TYPE_INVALID
message.locale: Invalid address layout type %1s specified in address header.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_VERSION_NO_INVALID
message.locale: Invalid version number %1s specified in address header.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_ADDRESS_FREEFORM_EMPTY
message.locale: Freeform addresses cannot be empty.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_LINE_INDEX_OUTOFRANGE
message.locale: The address data line index %1n is out of range (%2n - %3n).

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_ADDRESSDATA_EMPTY
message.locale: The supplied address data is empty.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_XFV_ADDRESS_LINE1_LINE2
message.locale: Street 1 must contain at least 3 characters when Apt/Suite is empty.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_ADDRESS_LINE_LENGTH
message.locale: Address line %1n must contain at least 3 characters.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_ADDRESSHEADER_INVALID
message.locale: Address header information is missing or invalid.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_ADDRESSDATA_LONG
message.locale: The address data for this address is too long.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_LINE1_LONG
message.locale: Address line 'Apt/suite' is too long (%1n)- maximum allowed is 256.
Address line 1 is too long (%1n)- maximum allowed is 256.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_CITY_LONG
message.locale: Address line 'City' is too long (%1n)- maximum allowed is 256.
Address line 'City' is too long (%1n)- maximum allowed is 256.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_ZIP_LONG
message.locale: Address line 'Zip' is too long (%1n)- maximum allowed is 256.
Address line 'PostCode' is too long (%1n)- maximum allowed is 256.

message.name: INF_ADDRESS_GEOCODE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Geo code can not be found for created address.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_XFV_NOT_SUPPLIED
message.locale: An address must be selected or a new address entered.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_XFV_MULTIPLE_ADDRESS
message.locale: An address must be selected or a new address entered but not both.

message.name: TEXT_ADDRESS_UNAVAILABLE
message.locale: Address Unavailable

message.name: ERR_CITY_UNAVAILABLE
message.locale: Please enter the city information.

message.name: ERR_POSTAL_CODE_FORMAT
message.locale: Postcode format is invalid.

message.name: ERR_POSTAL_CODE_INVALID_FORMAT
message.locale: The Postal Code entered is not in a valid format.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_CITY_POSTCODE_EMPTY
message.locale: Address line 'City / PostCode' cannot be empty.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_STREET_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Please enter the street name information.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_POSTAL_CODE_FORMAT_A1A_1A1
message.locale: The Postal Code entered is not in a valid format. It must be in the following format: A1A 1A1.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_XFV_ADD1_AND_ADD2_EMPTY
message.locale: Either Address Line 1 or Address Line 2 must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_POSTAL_CODE_FORMAT_XXX_XXX
message.locale: The Postal Code entered is not in a valid format. It must be in the following six digit format: xxx-xxx.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_POSTAL_CODE_FORMAT_XXX_XXXX
message.locale: The Postal Code entered is not in a valid format. It must be in the following seven digit format: xxx-xxxx.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_POSTAL_CODE_FORMAT_XXXXXX
message.locale: The Postal Code entered is not in a valid format. It must be in the following six digit format: xxxxxx.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_POSTAL_CODE_FORMAT_XXXXX
message.locale: The Postal Code entered is not in a valid format. It must be in the following five digit format: xxxxx.

message.name: ERR_ADDRESS_FV_ZIP_NOTVALID
message.locale: The Zip Code entered is not in a valid format. It must either be in the following five digit format: xxxxx or the following nine digit format: xxxxx-xxxx.
